Name: Cuppa Joe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Nutty coffee fortified with vodka - well balanced.
History: Created in 2003 at Cellar Bar, New York City, USA. A variant of an Espresso Martini. See the story behind the Espresso Martini .
Nutrition: One serving of Cuppa Joe contains 148 calories
